actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide, as an item of the order of business of the House, for a period in which heads of executive departments and agencies are questioned in and report to the House.

summary.text: Provides, as an item of the order of business of the House of Representatives, for a period in which heads of executive departments and agencies are questioned and report to the House weekly.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide, as an item of the order of business of the House, for a period in which heads of executive departments and agencies are questioned in and report to the House.
